data.text: Ɔba nyansafoɔ tie nʼagya nkyerɛkyerɛ;
Nneɛma pa a ɛfiri onipa anom no ma no anigyeɛ,
Deɛ ɔkora nʼano no kora ne nkwa so,
Onihafoɔ pere hwehwɛ nanso ɔnnya hwee,
Teneneefoɔ kyiri deɛ ɛnyɛ nokorɛ,
Tenenee bɔ ɔnokwafoɔ ho ban,
Obi yɛ ne ho sɛ ɔdefoɔ, a nso ɔnni hwee,
Obi ahonya bɛtumi agye no nkwa,
Teneneefoɔ kanea hyerɛn pa ara,
Ahantan de ntɔkwa nko ara na ɛba,
Ahonya a ɛnam kwammɔne soɔ no hwere ntɛm so,
Anidasoɔ a wɔtu hyɛ da no bɔ akoma yadeɛ,
Deɛ ɔtwiri ahyɛdeɛ no bɛtua so ka,
Onyansafoɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ te sɛ nkwa asutire,
Nhunumu pa de adom ba,
Ɔbadwemma biara yɛ nʼadeɛ wɔ nimdeɛ mu,
Ɔsomafoɔ mumuyɛfoɔ tɔ amaneɛ mu,
Deɛ ɔpo ntenesoɔ no kɔ ohia ne animguaseɛ mu,
Akɔnnɔdeɛ a nsa aka ma ɔkra ani gye,
Deɛ ɔne onyansafoɔ nante no hunu nyansa,
Ɔhaw di ɔbɔnefoɔ akyi,
Onipa pa de agyapadeɛ gya ne nananom,
Ohiani afuom nnɔbaeɛ tumi ba pii,
Deɛ ɔkyɛe nʼabaa so no tane ne ba,
Teneneefoɔ didi ma wɔn akoma mee
